title: Can someone give me notes for organic chemistry of 11 and 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a number of websites on the internet which provide you videos or lectures on various topics But By seeing those videos you will have to make your own notes There are very few or no websites which are offering quality notes So here is a website on which you can find complete chemistry notes This is one of the finest content available on the internet And You don't have to spend even a single penny, it's all free Visit this website CHEMISTRY NOTES You will get all organic chemistry notes on this site Please upvote if found helpful !

See, referring to notes created by others is not something I would recommend. Every person creates their notes based on their requirements. They follow their own style. The best notes are the ones that you have created on your own. If you haven’t created, refer to the NCERT Chemistry Books. It will be easier to go through the important points, formulas, reactions, etc. from them. You can also use the Cheat Sheet section provided for each chapter in the STUDY platform of Embibe. These will have the important points from the chapters that will help you in quick revision. But all these won’t help if yo Continue Reading
